clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in prostate cancer

contraindications.disease: MoABs have been reported to have low toxicity as they successfully target the tumor cells
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: IDD 1 specifically targets cancer cells by simulating a natural immune response IDD 1 is produced by coupling dendritophages with tumor antigens obtained from the individual patient The resulting vaccine is then reinjected into the subject
